subject: Support - Cannot access my account immediately
body:
Hi team,
I cannot access my account and I need this fixed immediately. The reset link isn't working. Phone: +1-202-555-0139. Product: AlphaSuite Pro.
Thanks,
Jane

subject: Query: Refund for last month's billing
body:
Hello,
I was charged twice last month. Could I get a refund? My alternate email is rahul.alt@mail.com. I'm a bit frustrated because I raised this before.
Regards,
Rahul

subject: Request - Feature enablement for Beta
body:
Dear Support,
Please enable the Beta feature for my workspace. Not urgent but would be helpful this week.
Thanks,
Samir

subject: Help: Cannot download invoice
body:
Hi,
I cannot download my invoice from the portal; it shows a 403 error. This is critical for my audit tomorrow.
-Linda
